path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Callisto_Network/BRICS Token Smart Contract Audit Report by Callisto Network.md

findings.title: A01.Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens?
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to mint an unlimited amount of tokens.

findings.title: A02.Owner Privileges
findings.description: The `mint` function allows the owner to issue an unlimited number of tokens.

findings.title: Bug Bounty Program
findings.description: Initiating a bug bounty program post-audit for comprehensive security validation is recommended.

findings.title: A05.Public testing
findings.description: The contract should undergo public testing to detect unforeseen bugs or issues.

findings.title: Automated Anomaly Detection System: Not Implemented
findings.description: Establishing a simple anomaly detection algorithm to monitor and respond to unusual activities is advised.

findings.title: A07.Multi-signature Owner Account
findings.description: A multi-signature setup for owner accounts is recommended for additional security layers.

findings.title: A08.Crosschain Address Collisions
findings.description: Transactions can be mistakenly sent to a contract's address on a different chain (ETH, ETC, CLO, etc.). To mitigate this, deploying a 'mock contract' that allows token withdrawal or prevents fund deposits at the address is recommended.
